article_title: There's A Lot Of Value On The Longer End Of The Curve

article_metadata.author: Wallace Forbes

og.description: Hugh McGuirk: A lot of people get worried about the Muni market because of the highly publicized problems that exist. But I certainly want to remind your readers that the Muni market is still a very high quality market, and issuer fundamentals remain generally sound -- despite there being areas [...]
